languages.text: {n}Мутант заходится мокрым хлюпающим смехом.{/n} "Я — пастырь чистых! Многорукий Император наделил мой разум силой зреть Его, и я вел детей Его, пока ты... не приш{mf|ел|ла} и не убил{mf||а} нас. Ерети{mf|к|чка}!"

{n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мутант заходится мокрым хлюпающим смехом.{/n} "Я — пастырь чистых! Многорукий Император наделил мой разум силой зреть Его, и я вел детей Его, пока ты... не приш{mf|ел|ла} и не убил{mf||а} нас. Ерети{mf|к|чка}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Emperor-in-the-Void has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

{n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

{n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

languages.text: {n}Le mutant éclate de rire, et son menton se couvre de bave.{/n} « Je suis le berger des purs ! L'Empereur aux mille bras a béni mon esprit avec la capacité de Le voir, et j'ai guidé Ses enfants... jusqu'à ce que vous nous massacriez, hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant éclate de rire, et son menton se couvre de bave.{/n} « Je suis le berger des purs ! L'Empereur aux mille bras a béni mon esprit avec la capacité de Le voir, et j'ai guidé Ses enfants... jusqu'à ce que vous nous massacriez, hérétiques ! »

languages.text: {n}El mutante estalla en risotadas húmedas y sorbidos.{/n} «¡Soy el pastor de los puros! El Emperador de Múltiples Brazos ha bendecido mi mente con la capacidad de observarlo, y he guiado a Sus hijos... ¡hasta que has venido a masacrarnos, hereje!».
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante estalla en risotadas húmedas y sorbidos.{/n} «¡Soy el pastor de los puros! El Emperador de Múltiples Brazos ha bendecido mi mente con la capacidad de observarlo, y he guiado a Sus hijos... ¡hasta que has venido a masacrarnos, hereje!».

languages.text: {n}这个变种人突然大笑起来，发出了黏糊糊的声音。{/n}“我是纯洁之人的牧人！四臂神皇为我的心灵赐福，让我得以见到祂的圣姿。我引导着祂的子民……可你却杀害了我们，你这异端分子！”
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个变种人突然大笑起来，发出了黏糊糊的声音。{/n}“我是纯洁之人的牧人！四臂神皇为我的心灵赐福，让我得以见到祂的圣姿。我引导着祂的子民……可你却杀害了我们，你这异端分子！”

languages.text: {n}変異体は湿った、喉を鳴らすような笑い方をした。{/n}「私は純粋な者たちの牧者だ！千手皇帝は私の心に彼を見る能力を授け、私は子供たちを導いてきた…お前がやってきて私たちを虐殺するまではな、異端者め！」
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体は湿った、喉を鳴らすような笑い方をした。{/n}「私は純粋な者たちの牧者だ！ヴォイドの皇帝は私の心に彼を見る能力を授け、私は子供たちを導いてきた…お前がやってきて私たちを虐殺するまではな、異端者め！」

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant bricht in feuchtes, schlürfendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Ich bin der Hirte der Reinen! Der vielarmige Imperator hat meinen Verstand mit der Gabe gesegnet, ihn zu sehen, und ich habe seine Kinder geführt ... bis Ihr gekommen seid und uns abgeschlachtet habt, {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mutant bricht in feuchtes, schlürfendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Ich bin der Hirte der Reinen! Der vielarmige Imperator hat meinen Verstand mit der Gabe gesegnet, ihn zu sehen, und ich habe seine Kinder geführt ... bis Ihr gekommen seid und uns abgeschlachtet habt, {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin}!"

languages.text: {n}Mutant; vıcık vıcık, ıslak bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Ben saf olanların çobanıyım! Çok Kollu İmparator, zihnimi O'nu görebilme kabiliyetiyle kutsadı ve ben de O'nun çocuklarına kılavuzluk ettim... Ta ki sen gelip bizi katledene kadar kâfir!"
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant erupts in wet, slurping laughter.{/n} "I am the herder of the pure! The Many-Armed Emperor has blessed my mind with the ability to behold Him, and I guided His children... until you came and slaughtered us, heretic!"
